suppress.notes: file name: jgroups-3.6.14.Final.jar Runtime Apache Geode dependency; largely depends on how the customer deploys it
file name: log4j-api-2.12.1.jar Will be filtered out at runtime by the actual dependency managed by dependabot

file name: geode-core-1.14.0.jar Many old false positive CVEs for http_server(CVE-2018-1303, CVE-2003-0789, CVE-2013-2249, CVE-2009-1890, CVE-2009-1891, CVE-2017-9798, CVE-2016-5387, CVE-2017-9788, CVE-2004-2343) which we actually don't even use.
